actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide a 20-percent across-the-board increase in benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) a 20-percent across-the-board increase in monthly benefits and lump sum death payments.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide a 20-percent across-the-board increase in benefits thereunder.
